name: Iron Man
description: Wounded, captured and forced to build a weapon by his enemies, billionaire industrialist Tony Stark instead created an advanced suit of armor to save his life and escape captivity. Now with a new outlook on life, Tony uses his money and intelligence to make the world a safer, better place as Iron Man.

name: Captain America
description: Vowing to serve his country any way he could, young Steve Rogers took the super soldier serum to become America's one-man army. Fighting for the red, white and blue for over 60 years, Captain America is the living, breathing symbol of freedom and liberty.

name: Black Panther
description: King T'Challa of Wakanda, also known as the Black Panther, is a brilliant strategist, scientist, and warrior who defends his nation with enhanced abilities granted by the Heart-Shaped Herb.

name: Thor
description: As the Norse God of thunder and lightning, Thor wields one of the greatest weapons ever made, the enchanted hammer Mjolnir. While others have described Thor as an over-muscled, oafish imbecile, he's quite smart and compassionate. He's self-assured, and he would never, ever stop fighting for a worthwhile cause.

name: Hulk
description: Caught in a gamma bomb explosion while trying to save the life of a teenager, Dr. Bruce Banner was transformed into the incredibly powerful creature called the Hulk. An all too often misunderstood hero, the angrier the Hulk gets, the stronger the Hulk gets.

name: Black Widow
description: Natasha Romanoff, a former Russian spy turned S.H.I.E.L.D. agent and Avenger, is a master of martial arts, marksmanship, and espionage. Known as Black Widow, she seeks redemption for her past.

name: Hawkeye
description: Clint Barton, known as Hawkeye, is a master archer and sharpshooter. Despite being a regular human among super-powered beings, his skill and determination make him an invaluable member of the Avengers.

name: Doctor Strange
description: Dr. Stephen Strange, a once-renowned neurosurgeon, became the Sorcerer Supreme after a tragic accident led him to the mystic arts. He now protects Earth from magical and interdimensional threats.

name: Scarlet Witch
description: Wanda Maximoff, also known as Scarlet Witch, is one of the most powerful beings in the Marvel Universe, capable of manipulating reality and wielding chaos magic.

name: Vision
description: The metal monstrosity called Ultron created the synthetic humanoid known as the Vision from the remains of the original android Human Torch of the 1940s to serve as a vehicle of vengeance against the Avengers.

name: Falcon
description: With a mental connection to all birds and a suit that gives him wings to fly, The Falcon has been both the partner to Captain America and an Avenger himself. Whether as a superhero or in his secret identity of social worker Sam Wilson, The Falcon dedicates his life to standing up for others.

name: Spider-Man (Peter Parker)
description: Bitten by a radioactive spider, high school student Peter Parker gained the speed, strength and powers of a spider. Adopting the name Spider-Man, Peter hoped to start a career using his new abilities. Taught that with great power comes great responsibility, Spidey has vowed to use his powers to help people.

name: Winter Soldier
description: Once Captain America's best friend, Bucky Barnes was transformed into the Winter Soldierâ€”a brainwashed assassin with a bionic arm. After regaining his memories, he fights to make amends for his past.

name: Deadpool
description: Wade Wilson was born in Canada, but grew up to become the least Canadian person ever. When it comes to the Merc with a Mouth, with great power comes no responsibility.

name: Cyclops
description: Scott Summers, also known as Cyclops, is a leader of the X-Men and a master strategist. His optic blasts are both a powerful weapon and a constant challenge to control.

name: Beast
description: Dr. Hank McCoy, also known as Beast, is a genius-level scientist with superhuman strength, agility, and a distinctive blue, furry appearance. His intellect is matched only by his compassion.

name: Storm
description: Ororo Monroe is the descendant of an ancient line of African priestesses, all of whom have white hair, blue eyes, and the potential to wield magic.

name: Rogue
description: Rogue is a powerful mutant with the ability to absorb the powers, memories, and life force of others through touch, often struggling to control her abilities.

name: Thanos
description: The Mad Titan Thanos, a melancholy, brooding individual, consumed with the concept of death, sought out personal power and increased strength, endowing himself with cybernetic implants until he became more powerful than any of his brethren.

name: Gamora
description: The last of her species, Gamora was adopted by Thanos and raised to be the deadliest woman in the galaxy. She now fights alongside the Guardians of the Galaxy to atone for her past.

name: Green Goblin (Norman Osborn)
description: Industrialist Norman Osborn became the Green Goblin after an experimental serum enhanced his strength and intelligence at the cost of his sanity, making him Spider-Man's most dangerous foe.
